name: Project Boost (anurajbh)
description:
Welcome to Project Boost, a game I have created for the Udemy course I am doing- "The Complete C# Developer 3D(by Ben Tristem and Rick Davidson, GameDev.tv). The goal of the game is to reach the green landing pad. You maneuver your starship from a launch pad to a landing pad, dodging the obstacles on the way. Some of the obstacles may move, depending on the level.

Any feedback is highly appreciated.

Keys

Space - Thrust

A - Rotate Left

D - Rotate Right

Credits

Sound - Limit-Snap Creations, GameDev.tv(Ben Tristem and Rick Davidson)

Particle Effects - Rick Davidson
